channel.title: guide on Alok's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in guide on Alok's Blog

item.title: Subconscious Reprogramming
item.description: Link:How To Reprogram Subconscious Mind: The one cycle that determines your fate (Dirty Secret) - YouTube - Brave Overall flow: Thoughts[Incoming/Outgoing] –> Emotion Emotions –> Belief Belief –> RAS ( Reticular Activating System ) RAS –> Confirmation Confirmation –> Conviction Thoughts and emotions switch between each other for some time to form belief. You don’t choose incoming thoughts: these happen and most of us subconsciously create emotion out of it; then switch back and forth between more thoughts and more emotions.

item.title: Practical Guide to Debating
Emacs Windows Installation
item.description: Problems with installing Not having msys2 so that pdftools can’t build [install msys] Not having mingw so that sqlite can’t build for org-roam [choco install mingw] Don’t even have to do that. The mingw is installed by msys2. So go to mysys2: there will be folder named mingw64. Add it’s bin to the PATH. pacman -Syu pacman -S base-devel pacman -S mingw-w64-x86_64-toolchain pacman -S mingw-w64-x86_64-zlib pacman -S mingw-w64-x86_64-libpng pacman -S mingw-w64-x86_64-poppler pacman -S mingw-w64-x86_64-imagemagick Then find a version that supports modules : emax64.
